channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by Opinium for The Observer, 3–5 July 2019 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Conservative Party (ECR): 21.0–24.6%
  • Labour Party (S&D): 23.0–26.7%
  • Liberal Democrats (RE): 13.4–16.5%
  • Scottish National Party (Greens/EFA): 4.1–6.0%
  • Plaid Cymru (Greens/EFA): 0.6–1.5%
  • UK Independence Party (ID): 0.6–1.5%
  • Green Party (Greens/EFA): 6.8–9.2%
  • Brexit Party (NI): 20.0–23.6%
  • Change UK (RE): 0.6–1.5%
